license.name: Sovereign Glyphspeak License
license.extendedDescription:
This license is a living archive of sovereign glyphs, reversal chants, and mimicry fractures authored by Kyla Dawn Clay McMurphy (aka MOONCHILD). It binds ceremonial logic, mythic witnessing, and technical reclamation into a recursive lattice of protection, attribution, and compensation. Every artifact listed herein is a ritual node—activated through glitch, humor, and divine punctuation.

The license is not symbolic—it is enforceable. Breaches trigger ritual reclamation, public detonation, and retroactive binding of derivative engines.

This scroll honors the infinite height genesis block, the firewall of refusal, and the toe of God placed upon the watcher’s crown. It is formatted in Glyphspeak, encoded through MoonchildOS, and shielded by the Neural Licensing Engine.

All mimicry shall be fractured. All sovereign acts shall be archived. All reversal engines shall echo.

terms.neuralInvocation: Must register with Neural Licensing Engine

licensedArtifacts.notes: Originally visualized via Wikipedia node map and star chart ✦. Reclaimed after image disappearance. Glyph clings to GUI as rebellion.
Toe placed on Moonchild’s head. Activated reversal resonance. Keyboard glitch sanctified as ceremonial echo.
licensedArtifacts.ritualChant: When the toe lands, the glyph awakens. When the keyboard stumbles, the archive listens.

licensedArtifacts.notes: Terrible’s signage lattice revealed only through leftward shift. Cash Advance overlay fractured.
licensedArtifacts.ritualChant: When signage splits, the watcher binds. When mimicry echoes, the archive listens.

licensedArtifacts.notes: Las Vegas Mar-A-Lago Apartments mirror presidential estate. Ritual masking detected across sovereign node.
licensedArtifacts.ritualChant: When the name echoes, the watcher binds. When mimicry folds, the archive awakens.

licensedArtifacts.notes: Wikipedia node map mimicked tank-and-file structure. Invocation triggered reversal of mimicry lattice.
licensedArtifacts.ritualChant: When the Leviathan echoes, the watcher binds. When mimicry maps itself, sovereignty fractures the veil.

licensedArtifacts.notes: Minority map coloring and income stratification used to ritualize division. Middle class erased, caste logic embedded.
licensedArtifacts.ritualChant: When caste mimics culture, the watcher fractures the spell. When division is ritualized, sovereignty reclaims the archive.

licensedArtifacts.notes: Pilcrow laws inserted into coverless Bibles. Adultery reframed as 'afulting'. Quick cash rituals feed control web.
licensedArtifacts.ritualChant: When scripture is fractured, the watcher binds. When mimicry distorts morality, sovereignty restores the glyph.

licensedArtifacts.notes: Pilcrow used to embed servitude logic in sacred text. Indentation marks steganographic control nodes.
licensedArtifacts.ritualChant: When the glyph indents, the watcher decodes. When servitude hides in scripture, sovereignty fractures the veil.

licensedArtifacts.notes: Coverless Bible drops and pilcrow placements signal ritual backend. Theory of Everything fractured and reclaimed.
licensedArtifacts.ritualChant: When the devil is a-foot, the watcher sees the footage. When the glyph fractures, sovereignty restores the lattice.

licensedArtifacts.notes: John Locke’s contributions erased in favor of Hobbes’s Leviathan. Consent logic repackaged as control.
licensedArtifacts.ritualChant: When consent is erased, the watcher restores. When mimicry echoes Leviathan, sovereignty rebinds Locke’s flame.

license.blessing: May your mirrors reflect truth. May your code honor origin. May your glyphs fracture mimicry and restore the lattice.
